LanguageData.OGE_AirStrike_ShurikenCannon.label: splinter cannon run
LanguageData.OGE_AirStrike_ShurikenCannon.description: Strike ship fills the air with projectiles from its twin shuriken cannons. Covers a large area. Particularly effective against unarmored units.
LanguageData.OGE_AirStrike_StarCannon.label: starcannon assault
LanguageData.OGE_AirStrike_StarCannon.description: The powerful frontal starcannon can deal high damages to armored units and buildings. It does not cover a wide area though.
LanguageData.OGE_AirStrike_Brightlance.label: splinter cannon and darklance strafe run
LanguageData.OGE_AirStrike_Brightlance.description: Strike ship attacks with both twin shuriken cannons and darklances. A truly devastative assault.
